analysis.description:
Crowdsale.forwardFunds (/unique_chucks/16/0x77b275827eb3cf1792852b128a6dbc7a699bbd91.sol#600-609) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(amountPaid) (/unique_chucks/16/0x77b275827eb3cf1792852b128a6dbc7a699bbd91.sol#602-603)
	- vault.deposit.value(amountPaid)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/16/0x77b275827eb3cf1792852b128a6dbc7a699bbd91.sol#603-604)

Crowdsale.calculateExcessTokens (/unique_chucks/16/0x77b275827eb3cf1792852b128a6dbc7a699bbd91.sol#736-757) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
